name: undiscovered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not discovered or known about: The ruins of the church lay undiscovered until 1948. She regards herself as an artist of great but as yet undiscovered potential.
More examplesFewer examplesThe deception went undiscovered for years.We spent a few happy weeks touring here and found many largely undiscovered gems.He is one of the growing number who die alone and then lie undiscovered for weeks.The Black Sea forest which we travelled through for a full day is the undiscovered wonder of the world.
